name: I Made A Game With Aliens In IT!?! Demo
name_original: I Made A Game With Aliens In IT!?! Demo
description:
Pew Pew! 

Okay the name of the game was inspired by I made a game with zombies in it! and the game itself was inspired by space invaders! This game is my first created ever and i appreciate anyone who downloads this! 

Things to note when playing the game if you ever get bored hit ESC key because you will end up with the sound playing on your desktop when the game isn't even running.  by using the arrow keys or A,W,S,D to move your ship to fire a rocket press the space bar. Note that only one missile will fire when another is shot the other bullet disappears! 

Please remember to close my game press ESC

This download includes:

  • The Demo code! (visual basic 6)
  • The Demo itself
